name: Voxel Raider
description:
Gameplay

In this demo you can play the Croft Manor which has been overrun by a group of hostiles. You have to get rid of them.

Input

  • Move = W, S, A, D
  • Shoot = Left Mouse
  • Jump = Space
  • Run = Left Shift

Disclaimer

I made this game only for entertainment and programming education and it is not intended to be sold anywhere. The Tomb Raider franchise belongs to Square Enix.
